subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Jim O’Brien won an appeal Thursday and can return to the college sidelines after he had been fired by Ohio State as its men’s basketball coach and essentially barred from coaching by the N.C.A.A. for paying a recruit.A year after the initial 2006 ruling found seven rules violations, the N.C.A.A. threw out three of them and part of a fourth because the association’s enforcement staff missed a deadline for filing charges. Any further restrictions on future employment were lifted by Thursday’s ruling by an N.C.A.A. appeals committee.
